[00:00.00]Pure Cocaine - Lil Baby
[00:05.02]Lyrics by：Dominique Jones/Chris Rosser/Matthew Edward Robinson
[00:10.05]Composed by：Dominique Jones/Chris Rosser/Matthew Edward Robinson
[00:15.08]When your wrist like this
[00:15.80]You don't check the forecast
[00:16.83]Every day it's gon' rain yeah
[00:18.55]Made a brick through a brick
[00:19.91]Ain't whip up
[00:20.51]This pure yeah
[00:22.53]From the streets but I got a little sense
[00:23.83]But I had to go coupe no brain
[00:25.53]Coupe no brain
[00:26.23]Ain't worried 'bout you I'ma do what I do
[00:28.00]And I do my thing
[00:29.15]Do my thing
[00:30.05]Bought her brand new shoes
[00:30.96]Told her kick rocks
[00:32.00]Don't stand too close diamonds kickbox
[00:33.84]Think red means go so I don't stop
[00:35.68]I know they wish they could catch me
[00:36.80]But keep wishin'
[00:37.67]You think I done turned into
[00:38.57]A fiend for these
[00:39.38]Tryna stuff as much as
[00:40.19]I can in these britches
[00:41.79]Made your on my friend
[00:42.81]It's no difference
[00:43.32]I ain't never popped no Xan
[00:44.57]I sip sizzurp
[00:45.28]If I ever have to tell on the gang
[00:46.36]I won't do it
[00:47.05]If I put it on a song
[00:48.05]I seen it or been through it
[00:48.82]I can't put it in my song
[00:49.83]I know how the feds move
[00:50.73]Scream free all of the ahks
[00:51.88]Ain't no Fam Goon
[00:52.77]Gave my mama ten bands sent her to Cancún
[00:54.60]Got the crowd goin' dumb
[00:55.47]But I ain't no fool
[00:56.48]If I went in there and did it and made it
[00:57.91]You can too
[00:58.56]We done came a long way from broke
[00:59.72]And sharing shoes
[01:00.25]When your wrist like this
[01:01.24]You don't check the forecast
[01:02.22]Every day it's gon' rain yeah
[01:04.21]Made a brick through a brick
[01:05.12]Ain't whip up
[01:05.82]This pure yeah
[01:07.86]From the streets but I got a little sense

[01:10.86]Coupe no brain
[01:11.64]Ain't worried 'bout you I'ma do what I do
[01:13.43]And I do my thing
[01:14.58]Do my thing
[01:15.38]When your wrist like this you don't check the forecast
[01:17.28]Every day it's gon' rain yeah
[01:19.22]Made a brick through a brick
[01:20.08]Ain't whip up
[01:20.90]This pure this pure this pure yeah
[01:22.86]From the streets but I got a little sense
[01:24.30]But I had to go coupe no brain
[01:25.87]Coupe no brain
[01:26.68]Ain't worried 'bout you I'ma do what I do
[01:28.61]And I do my thing
[01:29.70]Do my thing
[01:30.43]Got a quarter million dollars in a book bag
[01:32.45]New Era I'm a boy no cap
[01:34.35]I'm living my best life for real
[01:35.87]Real
[01:36.39]Just left the dealership no tag
[01:38.08]If we opposite it won't work it won't last
[01:39.97]Get an opposite knocked off toe tag
[01:41.91]Ain't been home in a month got my ho mad
[01:43.76]They need me in the trap but I can't go back
[01:45.95]I jumped off the porch
[01:46.67]With a hundred dollar slab
[01:47.45]I got M's in the bank
[01:48.44]Give a what they think
[01:49.66]Every vibe I ever shot my shot at caught it
[01:51.58]Everything you ever seen me riding in
[01:52.84]Bought it
[01:53.34]Big dawg status I ain't gotta sell
[01:54.81]Put my craft into rap then I took off yeah
[01:57.21]New G-Wagon no key this a push-start
[01:59.04]I can hit the gas make it disappear
[02:00.86]When your wrist like this

data.trans:
[ti:Pure Cocaine]
[ar:Lil Baby]
[al:Street Gossip (Clean)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.02]//
[00:10.05]//
[00:15.08]等你像我一样手腕上戴满钻
[00:15.80]你就不用看天气预报了
[00:16.83]肯定天天下雨
[00:18.55]我的货堆成一摞又一摞
[00:19.91]我不卖次品
[00:20.51]这些都是高纯度的货
[00:22.53]虽然我来自街区 我还是有点良心的
[00:23.83]不过我也得买车 不用脑子想也知道
[00:25.53]我也得买车 不用脑子想也知道
[00:26.23]你不用太担心 我只做我该做的
[00:28.00]我只管自己的事
[00:29.15]只管自己的事
[00:30.05]给妹子买了双新鞋
[00:30.96]让她赶紧滚蛋
[00:32.00]不要离我太近 钻石闪闪发光
[00:33.84]红灯我也照样走 绝不停下等候
[00:35.68]我知道警察都想抓住我
[00:36.80]继续做你的白日梦吧
[00:37.67]你以为我真的为了女人
[00:38.57]变成恶魔了吗
[00:39.38]往裤子里
[00:40.19]尽量多塞钞票
[00:41.79]把你的女人献给我的兄弟
[00:42.81]没什么区别
[00:43.32]我从来不吃****
[00:44.57]我只喝**
[00:45.28]就算逼着我告发帮派的人
[00:46.36]我也绝不答应
[00:47.05]我写到歌里的东西
[00:48.05]都是我亲眼所见或者亲身经历的
[00:48.82]别的事我绝对不会乱写
[00:49.83]我知道政府就会拿这些东西作文章
[00:50.73]喊着 放了我的兄弟们 
[00:51.88]我可不是FamGoon
[00:52.77]给了我妈一万块 把她送去法国坎昆
[00:54.60]堵住众人悠悠之口 
[00:55.47]我又不是傻瓜
[00:56.48]如果我能做到这些 
[00:57.91]那你也能做到
[00:58.56]努力很久才有了今日
[00:59.72]从前我们很穷 连鞋都买不起
[01:00.25]等你像我一样手腕上戴满钻
[01:01.24]你就不用看天气预报了
[01:02.22]肯定天天下雨
[01:04.21]我的货堆成一摞又一摞
[01:05.12]我不卖次品
[01:05.82]这些都是高纯度的
[01:07.86]虽然我来自街区 我还是有点良心的
[01:09.35]不过我也得买车 不用脑子想也知道
[01:10.86]我也得买车 不用脑子想也知道
[01:11.64]你不用太担心 我只做我该做的
[01:13.43]我只管自己的事
[01:14.58]只管自己的事
[01:15.38]等你像我一样手腕上戴满钻 你就不用看天气预报了
[01:17.28]肯定天天下雨

[01:22.86]虽然我来自街区 我还是有点良心的
[01:24.30]不过我也得买车 不用脑子想也知道

[01:26.68]你不用太担心 我只做我该做的
[01:28.61]我只管自己的事
[01:29.70]只管自己的事
[01:30.43]书包里装了25万美元
[01:32.45]New Era的帽子 我说我抽** 这不是骗你的
[01:34.35]我过着自在美好的生活
[01:35.87]靠谱
[01:36.39]刚刚脱离分销处 一身轻松
[01:38.08]如果我们是死对头 那就没用了 生意不可能长久
[01:39.97]把一个对手打败了 尸体挂上名牌
[01:41.91]一个月没回家 我的妹子都生气了
[01:43.76]他们的生意很需要我 但我不想回去了
[01:45.95]我从门廊上跳了下来 
[01:46.67]就掉了一百块钱
[01:47.45]我银行里还存了一百万
[01:48.44]我银行里还存了一百万
[01:49.66]不管我去哪喝酒 你都偷偷跟踪
[01:51.58]不管你看我开了什么车 你都跟着买一辆
[01:52.84]买一辆
[01:53.34]我的地位堪比大佬 我不想再做那种生意了
[01:54.81]把我的事迹写进说唱里 我就出名了
[01:57.21]新买的蓝色奔驰G系车 没有车钥匙 一键启动
[01:59.04]我踩足油门 一溜烟就跑了
